overview:
Ronen Ben Efraim, is a revered CEO and Founder of several successful technology companies including, most recently, All-Z.

Vastly experienced with Business and Product Development, Internet and mobile technologies and Strategy, he founded All-Z with the expressed vision of making the internet a more connected place for users and developers. His interests include: Data-portability, AJAX, Web-Technologies, Object Oriented programming, and User Experience.

Ben Efraim is a distinguished honors graduate of Harvard University, Summa Cum Laude. He has received international accolades for his award-winning academic work focusing on decision-sciences, negotiation, and Innovation. Among his other achievements, Mr. Ben Efraim was nominated as a triple honorary John Harvard Scholar for academic distinction of the highest order. He is also an honorary member of the PBK of Harvard University.

Mr. Ben Efraim spends his free time advocating for educational projects, animal welfare, and global leadership.
